data.title: Matte As Hell Crayon Lipstick
data.description: Glam up your pout with our beautifully bold, incredibly long-lasting and gorgeously vivid SUGAR Matte As Hell Crayon Lipstick. This lipstick lives up to its title by providing the most smooth, silky soft matte finish!
